attributes.action: Built up area speed limits  clunes avenue caol
attributes.additional_details: Reduce speed of traffic in Clunes Avenue Caol, there's been an increase in children living in area and squares off Clunes avenue, the is alot of parked cars on road and children on bikes or walking coming out between cars.  I want the council to put speed bumps in an aim to reduce speed of cars.

rejection.details: This would be a matter for the local authority.
